sentences.sContent: ‘Any minus points ?’ ‘Well, the engine is rather noisy.’
sentences.sCn: “有什么毛病吗？”“嗯，发动机噪音很大。”

sentences.sContent: On the minus side, there is no free back-up service if things go wrong.
sentences.sCn: 不足之处是出了问题没有免费的技术支持服务。

phrases.pCn: 关闭一声部模式；零下一度

remMethod.val: min(小的) ＋ us → 把东西变小(的符号) → 减号； 减(去)

trans.tranOther: used to talk about a disadvantage of a thing or situation
used to show that one number or quantity is being  subtract ed  from another
